import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-anmeldung', templateUrl: './anmeldung.component.html', styleUrls: ['./anmeldung.component.scss'] }) export class AnmeldungComponent { isRecruiter = false; toggleRole(): void { this.isRecruiter = !this.isRecruiter; } }
